additional_info:
Furniture, Technique, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Elevator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 Hotel type residential complex “Sunset Kvariati” is located in Kvariati, the most prestigious sea side resort on the black sea, just 20 minutes away from Batumi City. Project is fully financed by Israel Investment group “Georginvest” and the project development is done by “Archi Group”. Flats are sold fully renovated. Minimum space of the flat is 42 M2. Company offers post sales property management service. Construction works will be finished in Autumn 2011. E-mail: nino@archi.ge; web: www.sunset.ge
